onyomiExamples.meaning: splendor, splendour, gorgeousness, pomp, magnificence, showiness, gaudiness, extravagance, luxury
beauty of form (oft. used of nature), beauty of a sculpted shape
splendid, magnificent, excellent, fine, superb, beautiful, admirable, utter (esp. defeat), total, complete, something worth seeing, sight, spectacle

kunyomiExamples.meaning: beautiful, pretty, lovely, sweet, pure (heart, friendship, etc.)
